Package com.google.gwt.language.client.translation

Classes that support translating from one language to another.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BrandingOptions Options for Branding.
LangDetCallback Callback for language detection api.
LangDetResult Wrapper for translation API Language Detection results object.
Option Option object containing text to be translated and the content type.
Translation Wrappers for all translation API.
TranslationCallback Callback for translate api.
TranslationResult Wrapper for translation API translate-text results object.
 

Enum Summary
BrandingOptions.Type Specifies the type of branding.
ContentType Content type of the text to be translated.
FontRenderingStatus Different possible font rendering status values.
Language All languages.
 

Package com.google.gwt.language.client.translation Description

Classes that support translating from one language to another.

These classes contact Google's translation service to detect language type and translate content between languages.
